translation: Karan became the third General of the Kaurva army,
Who in great fury waged a terrible war.

gurmukhi: hixE qwih pMQM sdM sIs k`ipE ]
transliteration: Hanio Tah(i) Panthan Sadan Sees Kappio||
translation: He was killed by Partha (Arjuna) and immediately cut off his head.
After his fall (death), the rule of Yudhishtra was firmly established.46.214.

gurmukhi: Bey sYx pwlM blI sUl slXM ]
translation: Then the brave warrior Salaya became the general of Kauravas.

gurmukhi: BlI BwNiq kuitE blI pMf dlXM ]
translation: He beat the brave Pandava foces fiercely,
And wounded the elephant of Yudhistra with his dagger.

gurmukhi: igirE ju`D BUpM blI BUp bydM ]47]215]
translation: Because of this Yudhistra fell down, but he killed the brave Salaya.47.215.

gurmukhi: sl rwjw jauny idn jUJw ]kaurau hwr qvn qy sUJw ]
transliteration: Sal Raajaa Jaoune Din Joojhaa|| Kaurau Haar Tavan Te Soojhaa||
translation: The day on which the king Salya died in fighting, the Kauravas felt their impending defeat.

gurmukhi: jUJq s`l BieE Asqwmw ]kUitE kot ktku iek jwmw ]1]216]
transliteration: Joojhat Sall Bhai Astaamaa|| Kootio Kot Katak(u) Ik Jaamaa||1||216||
translation: When Salya died, Ashvathama become the general, he beat violently millions of forces for one watch.1.216.

gurmukhi: DiRst dRon mwirE AqrQI ]pwNfv sYn Bly kir mQI ]
transliteration: Dhrist Dron Maario Atrathee|| Paandav Sain Bhale Kar(i) Mathee||
translation: He killed the expert charioteer Dharishtadyumna, and mashed the Pandava forces nicely.

gurmukhi: pwNfv ky pwNco suq mwry ]duAwpr mY bf kIn AKwry ]2]217]
transliteration: Paandav Ke Paancho Sout Mdare|| Duaapar Mai Bad Keen Akhdare||2||217||
translation: He also killed thefive sons of Pandavas, he fought very great waars in Dvapar age.2.217.

gurmukhi: kaurau rwj kIE qb ju`Dw ]BIm sMg huie kY Aiq kRu`Dw ]
transliteration: Kaurau Raaj Keeo Tab Juddhaa|| Bheem San Hue Kai At(i) Kruddhaa||
translation: Then Duryodhana, the king of Kauravas waged the war, against Bhim in great fury.
